name: Adult Treatment Program
description: Clients can become residents in their 80-bed residential facility in San Francisco for up to 6 months. During that time, clients are immersed in both American Indian cultural practices and Western approaches for substance abuse recovery and prevention.Your healing journey begins with an intake phone call with one of our intake coordinators.
